Package com.tloj.game.collectables.weaponeffects

package com.tloj.game.collectables.weaponeffects
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.tloj.game.collectables
     
    com.tloj.game.collectables.items
     
    com.tloj.game.collectables.weapons
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DiceReroller
    An effect that rerolls the weapon's dice and applies the damage twice to the target
    This effect has a 70% probability to apply.
    It is paired with the Nano Dirk
    HealthAbsorber
    An effect that absorbs health from the target and heals the character holding the weapon
    This effect is has a 66,6% chance to apply but it doesn't consume mana
    It is paired with the Nanite Leech Blade
    ManaAttackBooster
    An effect that allows the weapon to inflict from 5 to 10 dmg points
    It requires 3 mana points to be used
    It is paired with the Pulse Staff
    WeaponEffect
    An abstract class representing an effect that can be applied to a weapon
    As with the MobAbility class, this class applies an adaptation of the Strategy pattern to the weapon effects, allowing for easy addition of new effects
    This class is meant to be extended by specific weapon effects, guaranteeing modularity
